title: Are politicians pushing India to be like Saad Alavi's Pakistan?
selftext: The way various things are shaping up in India makes one feel that Saad Alavi's song '[Aapne Sabse Pehle Ghabrana Nahi](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_DRi1rzdz_E)' applicable to India as well.
comments: It is about how their erstwhile Prime Minister Imran Khan was insensitive to the citizen's welfare. It looks like during the Covid Imran addressed the citizens with 'There is nothing to be afraid at all'. And this was the phrase that was picked up this artist (political commentator) adding thoughts about inflation, corruption etc which are ripping the spine of citizens.

Imran khan and modi are 2 peas in a pod

Both a populist, alt right, extremely religious, sociopaths.
